structure.unit: Chapter 9 STANDARDS FOR CONSTRUCTION OF COUNTY BUILDINGS, ROADS, BRIDGES AND CAUSEWAYS

text.section:
Sec. 9-58. Approaches.
The project shall not intersect with nor otherwise provide for the flow of vehicular traffic into or onto any public road owned or maintained by Miami-Dade County without the prior approval of the Board of County Commissioners upon the recommendation of both the Public Works Director and the Planning and Zoning Director of Miami-Dade County that the County facility can accommodate the additional anticipated and projected traffic with safety.
